
``join_expression``
=======================

join_expression

Description
-----------

joins expression list together while appending z value to cellIDs to ensure unique colnames

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   join_expression(expression_list, z_vals)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``expression_list``
     - list of expression values to merge
   * - ``z_vals``
     - z values to use z stacking expression values
